document.full_text: ryan murphy's feud with kings of leon has taken on a life of its own since the "glee" creator labeled the band "self-centered a--holes" and said "f--- you" for refusing to license their music to his tv show.
document.title: "glee" creator regrets his kings of leon outburst
lines_and_colors: ryan murphy's feud with kings of leon has taken on a life of its own since the "glee" creator labeled the band "self-centered a--holes" and said "f--- you" for refusing to license their music to his tv show.
